trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Thaymoth gazes wistfully into the distance, his thoughts malms away.
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Lorotte.
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Thaymoth.
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_TODO_02<tab>Deliver Thaymoth's letter to Ghin Gin.

TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_THAYMOTH_000_001<tab>That Ghin Gin worries about his son more than is healthy. For either of them. But perhaps I'm not so different. I had to leave my daughter behind in the Crystarium while I oversee trade with Mord Souq, and I've not been back for some time.

TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_THAYMOTH_000_002<tab>I'd like to send her a gift, to let her know we haven't forgotten about her. Only thing is, I've no idea what young women are interested in these days. I'd ask the others, but I don't want them to think I'm doting on her.

TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_THAYMOTH_000_003<tab>I was wondering if you could find out for me? Lorotte over there has a daughter about the same age as mine. I expect she'll know what would make for a decent present.
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_THAYMOTH_100_003<tab>Of course, something that's not too big or expensive would be ideal.
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_LOROTTE_000_010<tab>A gift for a young lady? Let me guess, Thaymoth sent you to ask me, didn't he?
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_LOROTTE_000_011<tab>We all know how much he misses that girl of his. He tries to put on a brave face, but deep down, he's a big softie.
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_LOROTTE_000_012<tab>Anyway, in answer to your question, the Mord make the most beautiful jewelry from precious stones and valuable relics excavated here in Amh Araeng.
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_LOROTTE_000_013<tab>I'll bet you don't see many of those around the Crystarium. How about something like that?
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_LOROTTE_100_013<tab>Come to think of it, I wouldn't mind something like that myself.
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_THAYMOTH_000_020<tab>Mord jewelry? I'll admit, that never would've occurred to me, but it's a fine choice. From what I recall, Ghin Gin deals in wares like that.

TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_THAYMOTH_000_021<tab>If I write a letter to him, would you be so kind as to deliver it to Mord Souq? I'll leave the particulars to him, since I don't know the first thing about gems and whatnot.
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_THAYMOTH_000_022<tab>Oh, and by the way, you don't suppose Lorotte cottoned on, do you?
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_THAYMOTH_000_023<tab>Bloody hells, nothing gets past her! I might as well ask her myself next time, but I appreciate your help.
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_THAYMOTH_100_023<tab>That Ghin Gin certainly is a strange one, but I daresay he knows a lot more about jewelry than I do. I'll leave the design and so on in his capable hands.
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_GHINGIN_000_030<tab>Oh, welcome back! I take it everything went well with Thaymoth?
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_GHINGIN_000_031<tab>A letter, hmm? <mumble> ...jewelry...daughter...Crystarium... <mumble> I see! Yes, I know just the thing!
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_GHINGIN_000_032<tab>The scavengers have found some nice necklaces we can use. Old, but shiny! I'll have it ready in a jiffy, then my son can take care of the delivery.
TEXT_LUCKZA022_03364_GHINGIN_000_033<tab>Before I forget, please accept this as payment for all of your hard work. You have certainly earned it!
